txt.en: 'What, you are going to try and stop me? Ha ha. Good luck with that, little [placeholder]!'

'I sent down servants to bring back treasures and useful things for the Black Word. I sent them down quickly, but no one comes back! Good you are here. I can send you down real quick too. I must get something for the Black Word.'\n\nYou assure the Olog-hai that you have no intention on being flung horribly into that abyss.
This is as close as you will want to get to the edge!
You should look over the edge into the abyss of Mordath.
While you attempt to take the Ithil-stone, Sapakár lunges at you!

'It seems you have found the Olog and survived. Your exploits thus far surprise me.\n\n'Moreover, you have seen the Abyss of Mordath. Indeed, that great chasm is a place of horror. I shudder to think what still lives down there.'
During your fight with Sapakár the Ithil-stone has vanished!
Lômazar can be found at the Ruins of Díngarth.\n\nYou should speak with Lômazar.
You see nothing in the darkness but you think you hear a very low growl
Sapakár can be found somewhere in Barad-dûr.\n\nYou should confront Sapakár.
Sapakár the Cleaver confronts you on the edge of the chasm of Mordath.
